Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: I'm currently getting blind weighed and honestly it's been so liberating as I was freaking out for the same reasons. When I was seeing the numbers, what helped me was reminding myself that it was weight that never should have been lost, I'm getting back to being healthy, and reminding myself of all the good things that come with nourishing my body (better mood, improved concentration, able to hold a conversation, etc.)
